name: Among Lock Screen 2 - All Task
description:
AmongLock app simulate like the complete tasks in the Among mini Game.

Features:
- Lockscreens with various task style (Reactor, Electrical wire, Swipe card and Hand scan).
- Imposter and crewmate colors.
- Emergency crisis screen.
- Cool Backgrounds & wallpapers.
- Animations and sound effects.
- Customize Ejection screen with skins.

Don't hesitate .. Download it now for FREE.
